Summary: Oval shaped , hovering smoothly by the mountain
divs: Sighting Details We were driving home from diner in Beaver Creek, when I saw up in the sky an oval shaped object hovering in the sky above the mountains to the east of Beaver Creek. The object was hovering slowly, and then disappeared quickly, shot away. The entire event lasted only approx 2 minutes. There was one bright light on the object like the Phoenix lights.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Avon
There were no other sightings in Avon on or around October 14th 2008
